comments.author: Elita Barteaux
comments.message: This is a very detailed blog on Progressive web apps and very well explained what the term “Progressive” means in Progressive web apps. PWAs basically provide you with the convenience of a web app and the intuitiveness of a native app. In case you want to build one for your business, here is a list of tools and resources that you would find helpful. https://goo.gl/C8JT63

comments.author: tomByrer
comments.message:
Great overview & engineering checklist!

I would not say the jump from web (app) to all the different device platform stores cost is 'free'. It takes extra engineering to plug in all the service worker libs & extra programming, AppCache, browser compatabilities, Though personally, I'd say the extra work is worth it, since not only it improves mobile performance & usage, but likely help desktop performance.
